constituent: jump, wooden leg, mouth, stop, footprint, pogo stick, chop-seal, hanko, utilise, utilize
koohiiStory1: The winner of the long jump competition was disqualified when they found he used a pogo stick tied to his leg to jump further.
koohiiStory2: The high jumper has his wooden leg fitted with a pogo stick, and can now jump even higher. (See my note at traffic (#1408) for pogo stick). EDIT (2 years later): Keyword "jump" leads to confusion later on (see cjon256´s post), "Dancing" would be better (but be sure to keep it distinct from dance (#1774)). New Story: I was no good at dancing due to my wooden leg... until I had it fitted with a pogo stick!
readingExamples: 踊り (おど.り), 踊る (おど.る)
